meanings.sent1: The misallotted prizes caused confusion among the students.
meanings.sent2: The misallotted funds led to financial discrepancies.
meanings.sent3: The misallotted seating arrangement made the classroom look like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The misallotted responsibilities weighed heavily on the team.
meanings.sent5: The misallotted keys left everyone locked out of their rooms.

meanings.definition: Given out in a mistaken or unfair way
meanings.sent1: The misallotted time slots disrupted the event schedule.
meanings.sent2: The misallotted resources caused inefficiency in the project.
meanings.sent3: The misallotted snacks at the party made for some interesting flavor combinations.
meanings.sent4: The misallotted blame fell on the wrong person.
meanings.sent5: The misallotted votes changed the outcome of the election.
